data.title: Great Adventure for Co-works, Family, Friends
data.text: Great attraction for Co-works, Family, Friends.  You have 60 minutes to solve the puzzle and break out of the room.  Great team building for co-workers and fun event for families including teens.  One of our teams got out with 8 minutes and the other with 6 minutes to spare.

data.title: A Fun Outing
data.text: First time doing an escape room challenge. Great theme rooms to choose from. You can tell the staff really enjoys their work. Would recommend 'Escape Tactics' to friends, co-workers, etc.

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Jennifer,

Thank you very much for reviewing us! We appreciate your feedback and love to hear that you enjoyed your first time experiencing an escape room.Thank you again for your time and for joining us at Escape Tactics.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A fun challenge
data.text: We went here with a family group of 5 people, and were assigned to the Bank Heist room.  We did a pretty good job...got the money out of the safe, but we did not get out of the room in the 60 minutes time limit!

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Bonnie,

Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us a review! We hope you will have the chance to try your hand in the Speakeasy next time and see what new difficult challenges await you! Thank you again for being an escapee from Escape Tactics!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Must do in Fort Myers! We made it out with 3 mins to spare....nail biter!
data.text:
My husband and I love to be tourist in our own town, by checking out all the local attractions and restaurants in our backyard. So we were thrilled to hear that a new attraction came to Fort Myers, Fl. Not only new but awesomely themed. 

We went to kick off my husband's birthday and what a fun way to do celebrate. It was just the two of us and we made sure to reserve a time where other slots were taken so that we could work with a group to ty to escape. And the teamwork we had with complete strangers was by far the coolest part of the experience. You realize real quick that you have to throw away any shyness and start focusing on the task at hand because the clock is ticking.

The entire experience is on par with the theme we signed up for -The SpeakEasy. From the moment we walked in, through the check-in with a roaring 20s gal to the actual room, the creative clues and after photos we felt immersed. They even have cool shotgun shell shot glasses you can buy for a souvenier.

It was a nail biter at the end, but we managed to escape with a little over 3 minutes to spare! What a fun feeling to escape. Now we are already planning when we want to go back.

If you are looking for something fun to do for date night, group outing or even a team building activity this is a must.

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello TheTravelingCarters,

Thank you so much again for joining us at Escape Tactics. You both truly made it much more fun for us as well being there! We hope to see you both again very soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Bank heist
data.text: We had an amazing time!  The staff was very friendly and informative.  We will definitely be going back to check out the other rooms.

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review

We had a great time with you all as well! Thank you so much for taking the time to join us!

data.title: We escaped with loot
data.text: I recommend everyone experiencing escape room.  We barely escaped the bank heist with our lives.  The staff are awesome.  I'm coming back to do the freak show.  Great times!!

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Lily,

Love the review and thank you so much for coming out and visiting us at Escape Tactics!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Speakeasy
data.text: Great entertainment and very friendly staff.  The puzzles were challenging but not impossible to solve. We had fun working together as a team to escape!!

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Patricia,

Thank you very much for joining us at Escape Tactics and we are very happy you had a fun time!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The Lindas pulled off the Bank Heist
data.text: We had an awesome time pulling off the best Bank Heist of all time.  Al Capone would have been proud!! The clues were well hidden and the experience was realistic.  Would recommend for friends or a team building.   Can't wait to try the Speakeasy !

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Jennifer,

Thank you very much for that fantastic review! We look forward to you and your group savvy crime sleuths to come back and attempt the Speakeasy..
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Bank heist
data.text:
Had so much fun!!  Solved the mystery in 45 min . Highly recommended to do!
Go and make AL proud. 
We are going back to do the other room soon!

data.title: BEST TIME EVER
data.text: This is by far the best escape room around ft myers. The most professional group of people own and operate this amazing buisness

data.title: Escape tactics
data.text: This was so much fun! I would recommend trying this with a fun group of energetic people! My group and I completed the bank heist room and were kept entertained the whole time.

We had a wonderful time with you as well!! Thanks for keeping us laughing and we sure hope you have a chance to come back to check out the Speakeasy!

data.text:
It was very fun!! Loved it! Clues and decor is very realistic! Groups of friends are more fun! 
Would go again!

data.title: True Social Interaction - Great for the family or for team building
data.text: Truly had a great team building experience at Escape Tactics.  Locking 7 strong willed women in a room could have been a real disaster, but I thought it would be a great team building experience and it was.  Not only was it fun, it required that everyone verbally communicate and problem solve.  In today's "face in the phone" interaction,  what a great way to work together, actually speak to each other, have fun and feel a true sense of accomplishment.  We did the Bank Heist, and will be going back again for our next team meeting.  It was a real hit with everyone.  The staff are truly invested in you having a good experience.

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Debra,

We really appreciate your follow up and feedback. We set out to ensure that Escape Tactics would be a home for companies and businesses, as well as families and individuals to come do something different and amazing in the Fort Myers area. We are truly happy to know you and your team had such an incredible time. We definitely look forward to hosting you and your fantastic group again anytime.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Bank Heist
data.text: So much fun. The Bank Heist was so clever. We escaped barely but we had an awesome time! A heart pounder . We recommend it for group of friends

owner_response.text:

Thank you for your review! We are happy to know you thought the Bank Heist was clever.. from Al's prospective, it is you that is the clever one!

data.text: This place was awesome great theme and friendly staff! It was hard enough if you like it hard but they gave you enough Clues to be able to finish it if you need it.

data.title: Amazing Date Night!!
data.text: My boyfriend and I decided to do the Bank Heist. It was a challenging but, fun adventure. The staff go above and beyond to make sure you have a great time. My boyfriend and I will be back!

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Emmy,

Thank you so much for joining us at Escape Tactics and it was a blast to have you all as well!! We very much look forward to seeing you both come and prove yourselves again as you venture into the Speakeasy..
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: FUN!FUN! FUN!
data.text: What FUN, I took my 27 year old visiting son and his girlfriend to the "Speakeasy" themed room, and we had a BLAST! We decided to dress up in theme, as encouraged by the confirmation email prior to the visit. The staff was AMAZING! I can not say enough WONDERFUL things about Escape Tactics. Escape Tactics is now in the top 3 of "to-do list" for future out of town visitors. Edison-Ford Estate, Music and/or Art Walk,  and Escape Tactics. My family is already planning, I see a Bank Heist in our future...."Thank You, THANK YOU, T.H.A.N.K. Y.O.U!" Escape Tactics.

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
CNottage,

Thank you so much for that positive review!! We are very happy you has such an incredible time and we are very much looking forward to seeing if you have what it takes to do the big Heist...
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome escape room!!
data.text: We did this escape room as a double date last night and it was awesome!! They have phenomenal customer service, and the game was challenging and fun! The 20s theme was so cool! We did the speakeasy room, and escaped! So fun and addicting! We will absolutely be returning to play again!

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Sam H,

Thank you so much for your review, we really appreciate hearing from you and making sure we can do everything possible for you to have a mind blowing adventurous experience here at Escape Tactics!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun date night
data.text: I am so happy that Ft. Myers finally has a few escape game businesses. I have tried 3 different places in the past. Two in tampa and one in orlando. Escape tactics was definitely a great experience. Even though we didn't get out within the 60 minutes they still let us finish the riddles to escape as there was no group going behind us. The staff dressed in the theme of the room (prohibition theme) so that was fun. The room was fully decorated in the theme is well which I love. Plenty of riddles and locks to solve. We got stuck on a few but they gave us hints to help us along. As a new business that just opened a few weeks ago they definitely are doing a great job and I highly recommend it to anyone to try!

owner_response.author: , Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text: HeidiRTR Thank you very much for your comment! It was a pleasure to host you and we really appreciate you taking the time to review us. We hope Escape Tactics will be able to see you again very soon and maybe this time, Al will choose you as a member of his gang in the Bank Heist!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Escape Room I Have Visited Yet
data.text: First off, this was the first time I was able to experience a themed escape room that was not redundant and similar to all the other rooms I have visited in Florida. Having a 1920's Escape Room with what was easily the most professional looking of the escape rooms in the area, there was no doubt I made the right decision. If you really want to experience a high quality escape room where the owners inspire you with that feeling of success from the start, hands down you need to visit Escape Tactics.

owner_response.author: EscapeTacticsFl, Manager at Escape Tactics, responded to this review
owner_response.text: wanderlustftmyer Thank you for taking the time to review us and we greatly appreciate you coming and experiencing all the exciting adventures we have to offer at Escape Tactics! Escape Tactics dedicates itself in providing the best product at the highest quality, and through our implementation of our 1920s theme, we hope to prove that to you and our future participants. Thank you again and we hope to see you and your group soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
